label: CropProduceBatch
comment: A group of crop produce considered or dealt with together.

datatypeProperties.comment: The value of the nominal size for this crop produce batch.
A crop produce specified for this crop produce batch.

referencedBy.comment: A crop produce batch harvested in the crop production for this agricultural process.
An input batch crop produce, such as seed or fertilizer, specified for this crop produce.
An output batch crop produce, such as potatoes, grain, straw, specified for this crop produce.
